thread.title: Star Wars The Force Awakens breaks the pre-sale cinema tickets record: Hunger Games, Avengers both smashed
thread.title_full: Star Wars The Force Awakens breaks the pre-sale cinema tickets record: Hunger Games, Avengers both smashed

title: Star Wars The Force Awakens breaks the pre-sale cinema tickets record: Hunger Games, Avengers both smashed
text: Lucasfilm debuted the movie's new trailer for The Force Awakens on Monday.The war between the First Order and Resistance took to the skies in the teaser - as Han Solo and Chewbacca teamed up with a new generation of heroes. Star Wars: The Force Awakens will have its world premiere in Hollywood, ahead of its cinematic release in the UK on December 17 and the US on December 18.Watch the new trailer below:
